transArray.content: A beautifully decorated hotel. The service is very friendly and parking is available at the door. The location is easy to find, only a few hundred meters away from Chaoyang Railway Station, and it is also convenient to go shopping in Joy City. The room is fully equipped, clean and tidy, and the price-performance ratio is very high. It is highly recommended!

Dear guests: Hello! Thank you very much for your support and recognition of the hotel. Everything we do is to bring a different holiday experience to every guest. We are really touched to see your satisfaction and affirmation. We We will continue to work hard and be ready for you to come back at any time.
